extendedInfo.description: *2.0.2 See site for updates. Helps you keep track of your workouts by color coding the date of your last session next to the exercise. Keeps specifics of each session by date for easy reference.* Completely customizable.* Uses Google Charts.* Auto Backup of Data to SDCard.* Edit existing exercises, and sessions.

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using this app for over a year now and I absolutly love it. I\'ve looked for other apps but they are just too detailed for their own good. You spend more time filing them out than you do working out.
reviews.author: Chris Carpenter

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.comment: Perfect for keeping track of PRs. Needs database of excersises and maybe some charts to visibly see progress but love the simplicity of it.
reviews.author: Philip Baiamonte

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Great App. Exactly what I wanted. Would b 5 stars if it could link to a Calender. My default would b perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great simple app. What I\'ve been looking for. Would give more stars if you could edit the order of the displayed workouts instead of alphabetical
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Am trien it out maybe a counter would be nice maybe have like plan to follow an reminders that lets u know that its time to work out
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.comment: I was looking for something simple and quick to log my activity at the gym during my workouts. Mostly for the sake of keeping track of the weights I\'m lifting on the machines. I use another app for the more complicated information, such as calories, but I never wanted to use it at the gym. This app makes it quick and easy to take down the info on my phone without looking like a total slacker goofing around on my phone every few minutes during my workout. Perfect! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect Clipboard Replacement-
reviews.comment: I\'m giving this 5 stars even though it needs an update and the developer seems to have abandoned this app. Regardless, it\'s easy to setup, versatile to use, and works simply. Doesn\'t work with WidgetLocker (I use Tasker to suspend WidgetLocker while Workout is running). Main problem is it isn\'t optimized for larger screens. I like it anyway.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs charts and ability to enter workout date (have been using Excel until now.)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Please allow text entry in the fields, as some gym equipment has letter designations on the plates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tn
reviews.comment: Love love love this app! Simple and exactly what I need to keep track of the amount of weight I\'m lifting! Great app!  Not overly crowded with what you don\'t need to just keep track of your workout!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a handy little app ! Does exactly as it says
reviews.comment: What a handy little app ! Does exactly as it says; records the exercises that \'you\' want and allows full customisation with reps, calories burned, time etc and all for free. 4.5 stars from this very happy user. HTC Desire Z
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is awesome for anyone like me who can let things slide.....custom exercises with not. of how no days since last done. Logs reps, distance etc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: no option to mark how many reps done for each set.What if u did 4 sets w/ dfrnt reps. Also can\'t go and mark what u did ystrd or bfr all strts frm tod
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like how quickly I can log my workout. The problem is that the graphs have stopped updating. It will only graph the first 6 dates of each.Garminfone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the simplicity of this app. it isn\'t overbearing. Easy to use in the gym. Just wish it let you create a wookout and tracked weight.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I dig the simplicity but not very useful. Needs a bit more
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would be great to add average and high heart rates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is just what I need. Slim and Simple.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The ability to do different number of reps per set can get tricky, but very good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Install2sd on froyo please... Great app though
reviews.author: A Google User
